descriptions.desc1: An expert in converting data to graphical interface for user to view and interact with data through digital interaction using HTML, CSS and JavaScript
descriptions.desc2: The facilitator for an agile development team. He ensures that the team stays focused and follows the agreed-upon rules for daily scrums.
descriptions.desc3: Creates the logical back-end and core computational logic, but also components and features that are indirectly accessed by a user.
descriptions.desc4: Responsible for conducting tests before product launches to ensure software runs smoothly and meets client needs, while being cost-effective.
